name: GamelanVR
description:
GamelanVR raises the concept of a serious game where players can use one of Indonesia's traditional musical instruments called Gamelan, which can be enjoyed immediately with the technology of virtual reality.

The target of this game are for students, because students are the prospective successors to the nation, which they could improve the cultures that have been passed down from ancient times. The other target of this game are for the general public, thus all people with all backgrounds can play this game.

In developing GamelanVR, the team used several applications, such as Unity for the game engine, Blender3D for making the 3-dimensional assets, Photoshop for the UI, and FL Studio for creating the fundamental assets of this game, which are the musics.
